entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clarenville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Snow or periods of rain late this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Windy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
